dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: I know of the ways to cut through a heart with elegance and eccentricity.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: It’s time again for a banquet of swordplay.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: Be wary of those with plenty of laughs and smiles to show. A sharp edge lurks beneath that deceptive expression.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: I do not enjoy the moonlight much. All it does is shed a gleam on what should be left unlit.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: These scars? They are healed up now. Rather than that… shouldn’t you be asking what became of those who left them on me?

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: The sharpest blade has no meaning if it lies unused.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: Are you curious of my past? Such things… have all been cut off long ago.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: To tell you a secret, I can slay a foe with both my eyes and ears closed. …I was in jest. Dante, you truly are credulous.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg: Until now, a clock was nothing more than a useless thing to me. Yours, however, has such a peculiar charm to it, Dante.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: You’re rather cold, turning away the moment a conversation dies down.

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: I shall stay by your side until my sword breaks.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: It’s time to raise a deluge of blood.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Are you in need of this blade?

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: The sword is still sharp.

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: I shall carve the sin unto you.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: It’s bloodshed.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Hmh…

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: A consequence of the scars.

dataList.desc: Ally Death
dataList.dlg: This will leave a scar not.

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Scars signify experience.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: It would seem that I dug a grave.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: I am relieved to see that they know to comply.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: I shred them to pieces. My mind is now clearer than ever.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: My sword has cut its fair share. Nothing stops me from accepting this result.
